title: Han-Shan
provenance_text:
Shindo Tsuji [1910-1981], Kyoto, Japan; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 404, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962.
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961. Payment was made with a check dated November 14, 1961 and sent on November 17, 1961.
